long_description: With a sloping top tube for easy mounts and dismounts, plus a shock-absorbent fork for comfort, the Raleigh Venture 3.0 Step-Through Women's Bike glides through errands, fitness and leisure rides. Aluminum frame is sturdy and designed for a blend of comfort and efficiency; flat handlebar encourages an upright riding position for great visibility. SR Suntour NEX 4100 suspension fork provides 100mm of travel to take the bumps and jolts out of the road; preload adjustment lets you fine-tune performance. Shimano Revo twist shifters are intuitively easy to use with a quick flick of the wrist; Shimano derailleurs shift smoothly through all 21 gears for smooth pedaling. Versatile Kenda tires provide a smooth and stable ride over a variety of riding surfaces. Shock-absorbent seatpost and Avenir Comfort saddle maximize sitting comfort. Convenient platform pedals work with most casual shoes. Includes mounts for fenders and rear rack (not included). Specs on the Raleigh Venture 3.0 Step-Through Women's Bike are subject to change.
short_description: With a sloping top tube for easy mounts and dismounts, plus a shock-absorbent fork for comfort, the Raleigh Venture 3.0 Step-Through Women's Bike glides through errands, fitness and leisure rides.
